info.author: Yves Junqueira
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Project Goal:
    To create a software for helping systems administrators to keep their Linux
computers updated.

Features:
    * Manage Debian-like systems in the network using a CLI tool (PyGTK
interface under development)
    * *VERY* simple installation, for both server and clients
    * Install packages in the remote computers
    * List pending updates
    * Roll security upgrades to computers
    * Update the remote nodes packages cache
info.name: Nwu
info.html_description:
Project Goal:
To create a software for helping systems administrators to keep their Linux
computers updated.

Features:
* Manage Debian-like systems in the network using a CLI tool (PyGTK
interface under development)
* *VERY* simple installation, for both server and clients
* Install packages in the remote computers
* List pending updates
* Roll security upgrades to computers
* Update the remote nodes packages cache
